#rstats 4.0.3 "Bunny-Wunnies Freak Out" (source version) has been released.

Yeah, it's Saturday, but 2020-10-10 has such a nice ring to it, and besides, it is the 10th (or 1010th in binary) anniversary of 10-10-10.
Learning #RStats was a gateway into my current career as a data scientist. For me, it was accessible because there were so many free resources online and such a welcoming community.

Time to flush out the data charlatans!

Here's how to separate the real ✅ #DataScientists from the ❌ fakers who use data to lie to you (& maybe to themselves too):

Do they

✅ call their shots

or

❌ peddle hindsight

?
